name: 15 Puzzle
summary: A classic game of puzzle 8 (3x3), 15 (4x4), 24 (5x5) or 35 (6x6) in which player has to move pieces on board so they are from 1 to 8, 15, 24 or 35.

name: 150 Floors
summary: 150 Floors of Magic or 150 Floors for short, is a tile-based, real-time strategy RPG where you play as a mage with either a Fire, Ice or Electric element, with more to come. Each mage has a wish they want granted or goal they want to meet. The only similarities they share is each mage wants to reach and conquer the 150th floor, granting them any wish they desire... Or so the saying goes. Beware, the floors made of tiles have a durability limit. If you attack a monster, you're also attacking the tile as well and it may break, sending the monster one floor down. The same logic also applies to you. If you fall through, you drop to the previous floor. Defeat all monsters on a floor, and ascend to the next floor. How will you fare against the 150 Floors? Will you get your wish granted?

name: 15 Puzzle
summary: 15 Puzzle contains five different slider style puzzles. These puzzles are an image that is split into a series of blocks and are mixed up. One of the spaces is left blank and any adjacent black can be slid into its place.

name: 15th Prison
summary: There is no way out of this prison. But examine your surroundings carefully, do not ignore any abnormalities. Take the envelope given to you by the block officer and proceed, there may be an escape route. Your carelessness may result in death.

name: 15 in 1 Solitaire
summary: Freecell and Klondike are just the beginning in 15in1 Solitaire! Dive deep into the world of Solitaire in the largest Solitaire combo released yet. Offering days of fun, pleasant looks and simple controls. Can your personal best measure up to the best? The common goal of all the solitaire variants is to eliminate all the cards, which are on the table. Move them to the corresponding pile based on the rules of particular mode. The cards are sorted based on their suits or values. Every variant have different rules and allows different card movements. Stack 'em all!

name: 15 Minutes
summary: Reality shifts. Time loops. You're trapped underground with only 15 minutes and something’s changing the rules. Spot the anomalies. Find the way out before the map turns against you or you might just run out of time. What you see may not be real.

name: 15th Floor
summary: You are stuck in an apartment building with endless floors. Observe your surroundings carefully to go up to the 15th floor and reach the roof of the apartment building. Do not ignore any abnormalities. Your carelessness could result in death.

name: 15 Weeks Before Summer!
summary: It’s 15 Weeks Before Summer! New city, new life, new Jimmy. In 2005 Osaka, he chases big dreams: profession, love, and friends. Shape his fate in this branching Adventure Visual Novel with multiple endings. Confidence and reputation meters, wild choices, and even wilder people. Osaka awaits!

name: 15 in 1 Family Games Mega Collection
summary: One bundle, endless fun!

name: 15 Minutes to the End of the World
summary: 15 minutes to the End of the World is a third person shooter inspired in anime and japanese culture, with a story based on the best time-loop Hollywood feature films - with a twist!

name: 1500 DS Spirits: Shogi V
summary: 1500DS Spirits: Mahjong V (widely used English translation. Original name is "1500 DS spirits: 麻雀V") is a Japan exclusive mahjong game. It is part of a large series of Nintendo DS titles which focus on table games all labeled 1500DS Spirits and created and published by Tasuke Co. Ltd.. This game is a special addition version of 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong and has extra added features compared to that game. This game used 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong as a base for this game so it has some similarities to this game including borrowed modes and assets.

name: 15 Giant Games, Vol.1
summary:
This is a compilation of 15 games of different genres published by JoWooD Productions Software AG, brought together in one large box with separate keep cases for each game, and with the games' latest patches and manuals included on supplementary discs.

The games included are AquaNox 2: Revelation, Arx Fatalis, Cultures 2, Europa 1400: The Guild, Far West, Industry Giant II, Itch!, Keep the Balance!, King of the Road, Pusher, Rally Trophy, Soccer Manager, The Sting!, THiNK-X, and The Nations

name: 155th Anniversary of the Pony Express
summary: Collect letters, avoid obstacles and aim for the ultimate 100 letter delivery!

name: 15-in-1 Mega Collection: Backtracking Ten Years
summary: Contains fifteen different games originally released for the VIC-20.

name: 15 Puzzle
summary: 15 Puzzle, or the slide puzzle game is based on the physical slide games where you try to put the scrambled numbers back in order. This one features manga images.

name: 15 Years a Doomer
summary: 15 Years a Doomer was a mapping contest held from March 22 to March 29, 2021. The event was organized by James Paddock (Jimmy) to celebrate his 15th year anniversary in the Doom community.

name: 15 Puzzle
summary: A homebrew application for the PocketStation developed by Aki H.Nissie. A simple 15-slot puzzle game.

name: 15 OS
summary: 15 OS is an old puzzle game for ZX Spectrum.

name: 15,000 Sudoku Puzzles
summary: A collection of 15,000 Sudoku puzzles for PC.

name: 1.5-Hour Community Build Project
summary: Compared to previous 1/2-hour CBPs, which had several people working on a single map, this 1.5-hour CBP had several people each working on their own mini maps.

name: 15 Puzzle
summary: The 15-puzzle is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of numbered square tiles in random order with one tile missing.

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 10: Igo
summary: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 10: Igo is the tenth game in the 1500DS Spirits series.

name: 15's
summary: A sliding block puzzle game.

name: 1500 DS Spirits Vol. 1: Mahjong
summary:
1500DS Spirits Vol. 1: Mahjong is a Japanese Mahjong game for the Nintendo DS.

The game also feature a quiz mode called "Furikomi Quiz" with 110 Questions.

name: 1500 DS Spirits Vol. 4: Reversi
summary: A DS implementation of the classic game of Reversi.

name: 150 Line Massacre: The Golden Skulls
summary: 150 Line Massacre: The Golden Skulls is a 36 map megawad by @NinjaDelphox, featuring maps by @Arsinikk, @Cacodemon187, and @Large Cat, and is a non-canon sequel to 100 Line Massacre. Originally intended as remaster of Ninja’s 5 Maps with 100 Lines, it turned into a full blown sequel featuring “remasters” of these original 5 maps that led to the eventual creation of 100 Line Massacre, along with re imaginings of these maps and 27 entirely new maps, including a previously unreleased 100 Line Massacre map! 150 Line Massa﻿cre also features a new gameplay mechanic: The Golden Skulls! Each map contains a hidden Golden Skull, and is required for a 100% playthrough, displaying a “Skulls” count at the end of each map instead of an item count.

name: 15 Minutes Dungeon
summary: Can you beat the dungeon in 15 minutes? Roguelike + RTA.

name: 15 Levels
summary: 15 Levels is a puzzle game.

name: 15 Move Hole Puzzle
summary:
The game simulates the 15 Puzzle, a sliding puzzle that consists of numbered square tiles located on 4x4 board in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space. 
 
This game includes the pictures of naked women (originally found in Playboy magazine) in background of the board. When tile is placed in order, it is converted in part of picture, but it still can be moved. There are 8 levels in the game, and certain tiles can't be moved on the board with level increase. 
 
The number of moves in counted, and the best scores are stored in hi-score table.

name: 15 Puzzle Slide
summary:
Another fantastic game by Gekko & Gilmore!
With an addictive feel and timer to beat, 15 Puzzle Slide is a great way to pass by some time! Not only is this retro game great fun, but also has a series of levels with some stunning photos of all different genres, from Nature to Iconic Buildings across the world!

name: 150,000 B.C.
summary: This is a game set in prehistoric age. There is an amazing primitive world, in which you will have to survive.

name: 15 Minutes At The World's End
summary: Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the chaotic realms of the apocalypse in this intense bullet hell. In a world teetering on the edge of oblivion, you must harness your reflexes, strategic prowess, and sheer determination to survive the onslaught of otherworldly adversaries.

name: 15 Defense
summary: 15 Defense is a puzzle game aimed at a wide audience. It enhances thinking and mind reaction as its game logic is based on that of a table game named "Fifteen Puzzle".

name: 15 ﾠ
summary: The 15-puzzle is a sliding puzzle that consists of a frame of numbered square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space.

name: 15 Awesome Card & Puzzle Games
summary: A collection of card and puzzle games for PC.

name: 15 Seconds
summary: 15 Seconds is a 2d arcade in which you have to move forward, take down obstacles, avoid shots in the search for an exit, but remember that your time is limited. in no case do not touch anything, otherwise you will have to start all over again.

name: 15 Minutes
summary: Parody of the tv show '24' - You have 15 minutes to defuse a bomb, ARE YOU A BAD ENOUGH DUDE?

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 7: Chess
summary: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 7: Chess is a Japanese Chess game for the Nintendo DS.

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 9: 2 Nin-uchi Mahjong
summary: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 9: 2 Nin-uchi Mahjong is a Japanese Mahjong game for the Nintendo DS.

name: 1500 DS Spirits Vol. 3: Block Kuzushi
summary:
1500DS Spirits Vol. 3: Block Kuzushi is an Action game, modelled after the classic game Breakout, developed and published by Tasuke, which was released in Japan in 2007.

This game is a simple and straightforward game in which the player controls a board to play balls and break the blocks in the screen. There are various stages with different arrangements of blocks, but can the player really clear all the stages?

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 2: Shogi
summary:
1500DS Spirits Vol. 2: Shogi is a Japanese Shogi game for the Nintendo DS.

For beginners, there is a "Teitei Learning Mode"! In addition to the basic rules, you can also learn how to win.

The "Go Evaluation Quiz" is a fun way for beginners and Shogi lovers to deepen their knowledge, review, and check their skills.

To test your skills, you can also try the mission-clearing 'Challenge Mode' with 15 missions and 45 stages!

You can also play against other players with one software using DS Download Play!

The game features 18 different characters to play against!

name: 1500 DS Spirits: Mahjong V
summary: 1500DS Spirits: Mahjong V (widely used English translation. Original name is "1500 DS spirits: 麻雀V") is a Japan exclusive mahjong game. It is part of a large series of Nintendo DS titles which focus on table games all labeled 1500DS Spirits and created and published by Tasuke Co. Ltd.. This game is a special addition version of 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong and has extra added features compared to that game. This game used 1500DS Spirits: Vol 1 Mahjong as a base for this game so it has some similarities to this game including borrowed modes and assets.

name: 1500 DS Spirits Vol. 5: Hanafuda
summary: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 5: Hanafuda is a Japanese Hanafuda game for the Nintendo DS.

name: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 6: Trump
summary: 1500DS Spirits Vol. 6: Trump is a Japanese card game for the Nintendo DS.

name: 15x15
summary: A collection of sliding picture puzzles. You can chose from 3x3 or 4x4 grid sizes and select from several pictures, you unlock more as you go. You are scored based on how many moves it takes to complete a puzzle starting with 999 for the 4x4 and 499 for the 3x3 puzzles and counting down.

name: 153 Hand Video Poker
summary: You get to play 153 different hands of poker at once. You won't get bored. Your whole screen be filled. Don't worry, it is super easy to manage all your poker hands at once and it is designed to be like Las Vegas style video poker.

name: 15 Days
summary:
A three-man activist group has set out to make the world a better place by stealing famous pieces of art in the world's most renowned museums, selling them to private collectors, and donating the money to charity. 
 
Though hunted by police forces, the group manages to stage one successful coup after another - until one day a mysterious new client appears and the group finds itself in the middle of a political conspiracy.
